word_mean: 〔USP〕利血平：由蛇根萝芙木的根部分离得到的一种生物碱，白或米色至浅黄色晶状粉末，用作降压药，亦作镇静药，口服或肌注给予

sentence.Network_en: The reserpine sample were analyzed successfully with the vacuum interface.

sentence.Network_en: Crystallization process of reserpine was investigated in this paper.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To compare the effects of Sanweishuyu recipe on reserpine reversal teat in mice by chrono - medication.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ⑵利血平（reserpine）：因其具有去儿茶酚胺和去血清素作用。是治疗雷诺征历史较久、疗效较好的药物。

list.abs: study on quality standards for compound reserpine tablets ., 复方利血平片质量标准的研究.
study on quality standards for compound reserpine tablets ., 复方利血平片质量标准的研究.

ESBLs , AmpC , VIM , IMP , OXA23 , OXA-24 and outermembrane protein were detected . reserpine synergistic inhibition test was used to study the active efflux mechanism .检测ESBLs、AmpC酶、VIM、IMP、OXA-23和OXA-24产生及外膜蛋白表达情况,利血平协同抑制试验检测膜外排机制。
results BCPT could reverse the blepharoptosis and the akinesia induced reserpine and increase the number of head-twitches induced by 5-HTP in mice .结果BCPT可拮抗利血平诱导的小鼠上眼睑下垂及运动不能，并增加5-HTP诱导的小鼠甩头次数。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: from the modern Latin species name R(auwolfia) serp(entina), named after Leonhard Rauwolf (see rauwolfia), + -ine

means.word_mean: 1. antihypertensive consisting of an alkaloid extracted from the plant Rauwolfia serpentina (trade names Raudixin or Rau-Sed or Sandril or Serpasil)
